titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish a refundable tax credit for parents who take leave from employment following the birth or adoption of a child.
Support Working Families Act
Support Working Families Act
Support Working Families Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Support Working Families Act
This bill allows a refundable tax credit for a parent who takes leave from employment after the birth or adoption of a child. To be eligible for the credit, the parent must have been employed and worked for a specified period and number of hours in that period.
